publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-612.2 Iain Smith: Potential G8 Summit at Gleneagles-As an amendment to motion (S2M-612) in the name of Roseanna Cunningham, leave out from "expresses" to end and insert "notes the lack of support for this opportunity from the local MSP and regrets that the SNP, a party that has so often claimed to want to have Scotland at the top table, is reluctant to have the top table come to Scotland."

S2M-612.2 Iain Smith: Potential G8 Summit at Gleneagles-As an amendment to motion (S2M-612) in the name of Roseanna Cunningham, leave out from "expresses" to end and insert "notes the lack of support for this opportunity from the local MSP and regrets that the SNP, a party that has so often claimed to want to have Scotland at the top table, is reluctant to have the top table come to Scotland."
